verses.verse: All the <S%H5971>people<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> into the <S%H7339>broad<s%> place that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> both <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> and all who could <S%H8085>hear<s%> with <S%H995>understanding,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

He <S%H7121>read<s%> therein <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7339>broad<s%> place that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> from early <S%H216>morning<s%> until <S%H4276>midday,<s%> in the presence of the <S%H582>men<s%> and the <S%H802>women,<s%> and of those who could <S%H995>understand;<s%> and the <S%H241>ears<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> were attentive to the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

<S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on a <S%H4026>pulpit<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> which they had <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H1697>purpose;<s%> and <S%H681>beside<s%> him <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> and <S%H8087>Shema,<s%> and <S%H6043>Anaiah,<s%> and <S%H223>Uriah,<s%> and <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> on his right <S%H3225>hand;<s%> and on his left <S%H3225>hand,<s%> <S%H6305>Pedaiah,<s%> and <S%H4332>Mishael,<s%> and <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%> and <S%H2828>Hashum,<s%> and <S%H2806>Hashbaddanah,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam.<s%>

<S%H5830>Ezra<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people;<s%> (for he was above all the <S%H5971>people;<s%>) and when he <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H5971>it,<s%> all the people stood <S%H5975>up:<s%>

and <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen,<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%>" with the lifting <S%H4607>up<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%> They <S%H6915>bowed<s%> their <S%H7812>heads,<s%> and worshiped <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

Also <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> and <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> and <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> <S%H7678>Shabbethai,<s%> <S%H1941>Hodiah,<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> <S%H7042>Kelita,<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> <S%H2605>Hanan,<s%> <S%H6411>Pelaiah,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> caused the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H8451>law:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> stayed in their <S%H5977>place.<s%>

They <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H5612>book,<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6567>distinctly;<s%> and they <S%H7760>gave<s%> the <S%H7922>sense,<s%> so that they <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H4744>reading.<s%>

<S%H5166>Nehemiah,<s%> who was the <S%H8660>governor,<s%> and <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H995>taught<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "This <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H56>Don't<s%> mourn, nor <S%H1058>weep.<s%>" For all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept,<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>them,<s%> "Go your way. <S%H398>Eat<s%> the <S%H4924>fat,<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H4477>sweet,<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H4490>portions<s%> to him for whom nothing is <S%H3559>prepared;<s%> for this <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%> to our <S%H113>Lord.<s%> <S%H6087>Don't<s%> be grieved; for the <S%H2304>joy<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is your <S%H4581>strength.<s%>"

So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H2814>stilled<s%> all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Hold your <S%H2013>peace,<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H6918>holy;<s%> neither be <S%H6087>grieved.<s%>"

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> went their <S%H3212>way<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and to <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H4490>portions,<s%> and to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> because they had <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were declared to <S%H3045>them.<s%>

On the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> to <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> even to give <S%H7919>attention<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

They <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law,<s%> how that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> should <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month;<s%>

and that they should <S%H8085>publish<s%> and <S%H5674>proclaim<s%> in all their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Go <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H935>get<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H5929>branches,<s%> and <S%H6086>branches<s%> of wild <S%H8081>olive,<s%> and <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> <S%H6086>branches,<s%> and <S%H8558>palm<s%> <S%H5929>branches,<s%> and <S%H5929>branches<s%> of <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5521>booths,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written.<s%>"

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H6213>them,<s%> and made themselves <S%H5521>booths,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> on the roof of his <S%H1406>house,<s%> and in their <S%H2691>courts,<s%> and in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and in the <S%H7339>broad<s%> place of the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and in the <S%H7339>broad<s%> place of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

All the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of those who had come <S%H7725>again<s%> out of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5521>booths,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5521>booths;<s%> for since the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> to that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had not done <S%H6213>so.<s%> There was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8057>gladness.<s%>

Also <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> he <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> They <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was a solemn <S%H6116>assembly,<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance.<s%>
